thread.title: Join Grayslake Middle School fun run
thread.title_full: Join Grayslake Middle School fun run

author: Daily Herald report
title: Join Grayslake Middle School fun run
text:
Employees and students of Grayslake Middle School will hold their fourth annual run for healthy bodies Friday, Oct. 23. This year's run was designed to occur just before the annual Red Ribbon Week celebration. At Friday's run, Grayslake Middle School will host several speakers who are role models for healthy living expectations. Community members are invited to join the students in the free 1Â½-mile run. The seventh-grade run will start about 9:15 a.m., followed by eighth grade students at 10:30 a.m. or so. The speakers will present before the run times. Grayslake Middle School is at 440 N. Barron Boulevard, also known as Route 83.
 News Health & Fitness Grayslake District 46
